Title: Trump says he will announce a range of tariffs over 'next month o...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will announce tariffs related to lumber, cars, semiconductors, chips and pharmaceuticals 'over the next month or sooner.' (Reuters)

Title: N. Korea slams US for using AUKUS to bolster 'nuclear alliance' i...

Title: Japanese Embassy hosts event to celebrate emperor's birthday in S...
Description: The Japanese Embassy in Seoul hosted an event Wednesday to celebrate Emperor Naruhito's birthday in the South Korean capital.

Title: Italy arrests drug traffickers who used migrants as couriers, pol...
Description: Twenty-seven people have been arrested in a pan-European raid against two drug trafficking groups, one of which used migrants as couriers, Italy's Carabinieri police said on Wednesday.

Title: US displaced China as Germany's biggest single trading partner la...
Description: The United States was Germany's biggest single trading partner last year for the first time since 2015, displacing China from the top spot as exports to the Asian power declined, official figures showed Wednesday.

Title: Sweden's top court rejects Greta Thunberg lawsuit on climate acti...
Description: Sweden's Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that Greta Thunberg and hundreds of other activists cannot proceed with a class action lawsuit that had sought to force the state to take stronger action against climate change.

Title: Vatican authorities say the pope now has pneumonia in both lungs....
Description: Vatican officials said late Tuesday that Pope Francis had developed pneumonia in both lungs, further complicating the pontiff’s recovery. The 88-year-old pope was hospitalized Friday after a weeklong bout of bronchitis worsened. On Monday , doctors said he had developed a mix of infections in his respiratory tract.

Title: Senior NK diplomat hopes for strong exchanges, cooperation with C...
Description: A senior North Korean diplomat has voiced hopes for strong exchanges and cooperation with China this year during his meeting with Beijing's top envoy to Pyongyang, according to the Chinese Embassy in the North on Wednesday.

Title: Ex-top officials of Moon Jae-in gov't found guilty of deporting N...
Description: Four ministerial-level officials of the previous administration were found guilty, Wednesday, of repatriating two North Korean fishermen in 2019 despite their pleas to stay in South Korea.

Title: Musk's X in talks to raise money at $44 billion valuation, Bloomb...
Description: Elon Musk's social media company X is in talks to raise money from investors at a $44 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

Title: Trump signals support for Russia's demand that Ukraine hold presi...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday signaled support for Russia's call for elections to be held in Ukraine, as negotiations to end the three-year-old war kicked off in Saudi Arabia between Washington and the Kremlin with Kyiv noticeably absent.

Title: US, Russia forge ahead on peace talks, without Ukraine

Description: One of the two North Korean soldiers captured by Ukraine has expressed his wish to go to South Korea, a news report said Wednesday, in what would be the first known case for a North Korean captive to voice an intent to defect to the South.

Title: Hamas, Israel agree return of six hostages, bodies held in Gaza

Title: Russia, US to name negotiators on ending Ukraine war

Title: Panama says many migrants deported from US agree to be returned t...

Title: Federal judge won't immediately block Elon Musk or DOGE from fede...

Title: Brazil's ex-President Bolsonaro charged in alleged coup plot
Description: Brazil's former President Jair Bolsonaro was charged on Tuesday over a plot to overturn his 2022 election loss, the office of the country's top prosecutor said on Tuesday, in the latest legal setback for the far-right leader.

Title: Trump says to introduce 25% tariffs on autos, pharmaceuticals, ch...

Title: How US tech giants supplied Israel with AI models, raising questi...

But the number of civilians killed has also soared, along with fears that these tools are contributing to the deaths of innocent people.

Title: Villagers in southern Lebanon prepare to return home as Israeli a...
Description: Israeli forces withdrew Tuesday from border villages in southern Lebanon under a deadline spelled out in a U.S.-brokered ceasefire agreement that ended the latest Israel-Hezbollah war, but stayed put in five strategic overlook locations inside Lebanon.

Title: Top Russian, US officials meet for talks on Ukraine war without K...
Description: Top Russian and American officials met in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday to begin talks on improving ties and negotiating an end to the war in Ukraine .

Title: Chinese travel agency to bring 10 tourists to N. Korea's Rason ne...
Description: A Chinese travel agency was accepting registrations for a tour of North Korea's northeastern city of Rason next week, in yet another sign of reopening to foreign tourists after a five-year COVID-19 border closure, the firm's website showed Tuesday.

Title: China snow village apologizes for fake cotton snow

Title: Argentina federal judge to probe Milei crypto scandal, stock inde...

Title: FDA staff reviewing Musk's Neuralink were included in DOGE employ...

Title: N. Korea to keep bolstering nuclear force, criticizes US for purs...

Title: Pope to remain hospitalized as doctors treat complex respiratory ...

Description: Top Russian officials will hold talks with U.S. counterparts on restoring ties, Ukraine and preparing a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and U.S. President Donald Trump, the Kremlin said Monday.

Title: End of road for Kolkata's beloved yellow taxis

The impeachment could see Duterte removed from her post and banned for life from public office and comes amid an escalating feud between her and President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, whose once-powerful alliance propelled them to a landslide election victory in 2022.

Title: Hamas says it will delay release of more hostages, putting Gaza c...

Title: China's population woes deepen as marriage registrations plummet ...

Title: China's Xi accepts invitation to attend Moscow's Victory Day in M...
Description: Chinese President Xi Jinping has accepted Russia's invitation to attend the commemorations of the Soviet victory over Nazi Germany in World War Two, TASS state news agency reported on Monday.

Description: The geopolitics of artificial intelligence (AI) will be in focus at a major summit in France where world leaders, executives and experts will hammer out pledges on guiding the development of the rapidly advancing technology.

Title: 2.1 magnitude natural earthquake hits N. Korea's southwest: weath...

This is the first time since his inauguration on Jan. 20 that the phrase 'complete denuclearization of North Korea' has been explicitly included in an official U.S. diplomatic document.

Description: China's consumer inflation accelerated to its fastest in five months in January while producer price deflation persisted, reflecting mixed consumer spending and weak factory activity.

Description: Donald Trump's tariffs are being challenged. But not the ones you might think.

A day after worldwide condemnation of Trump's announcement that he aimed to take over and develop the Gaza Strip into the 'Riviera of the Middle East', Israel ordered its army to prepare to allow the 'voluntary departure' of Gaza Palestinians.

Title: N. Korean leader calls regional public health modernization 'top ...
Description: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has attended a groundbreaking ceremony for a regional hospital, highlighting the wide gap between urban and rural areas and pledging to make the modernization of regional health service a 'top priority,' state media reported Friday.

Title: Ukraine says its long-range drones hit a Russian airfield as Fran...
Description: Ukrainian forces struck an airfield in southern Russia that was being used to launch Iran-designed Shahed drones , Ukraine’s General Staff claimed Thursday, as France said it had delivered a first batch of Mirage fighter jets to Ukraine.

Title: Swedish police say mass shooter was connected to school where he ...
Description: The shooter who killed 10 people in Sweden’s worst mass shooting earlier this week was connected to the adult education center where he opened fire with at least one rifle-like weapon, law enforcement officials said Thursday.

Title: UN report accuses NK of home searches, execution by firing squad ...
Description: A United Nations office has published a report carrying testimonies from North Korean defectors about their home country's heightened surveillance of citizens for possession of outside information and subsequent public trials, including execution by firing squad.

Title: Japan Airlines jet wing strikes Delta Air plane on ground in Seat...
Description: The right wing of a Japan Airlines jet struck the tail of a Delta Air Lines plane while the aircraft were taxiing at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport on Wednesday, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

Title: Nissan CEO tells Honda counterpart he wants to scrap merger talks...
Description: Nissan CEO Makoto Uchida met with his Honda counterpart Toshihiro Mibe on Thursday to say he wanted to end their merger talks after the larger automaker proposed making Nissan a subsidiary, said a source with knowledge of the matter.

Title: Trump team considers demanding WHO reforms, including American in...
Description: The Trump administration has been considering a plan for reform at the World Health Organization (WHO), including putting an American in charge,...

Title: Global Peace Foundation's Moon: Unification key to overcoming Kor...
Description: The famous phrase 'Winter is coming,' from HBO's long-running fantasy series 'Game of Thrones,' has become an iconic warning, signifying that difficult times or challenges are approaching and serving as a reminder that something unsettling is on the horizon.

Title: Trump signs order barring trans athletes from women's sports
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Wednesday seeking to ban transgender athletes from participating in women's sports, in his latest move targeting transgender people since returning to office.

Title: Chinese netizens use DeepSeek to copy Barbie Hsu's style in mourn...
Description: Chinese netizens have used the new artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot DeepSeek to mimic Taiwanese actress Barbie Hsu's style in farewell letters to mourn her passing.

Title: US Postal Service U-turn on China parcels sows confusion among re...
Description: The U.S. Postal Service said on Wednesday it would again accept parcels from China and Hong Kong, reversing a 12-hour suspension after President Donald Trump scrapped an exemption used by retailers including Temu, Shein, and Amazon to ship low-value packages duty-free to the United States.
